en: The Nigerian government announced Friday it was suspending Twitter in the country, just days after Twitter deleted a harmful tweet by Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari that suggested the state would use violence against the Igbo ethnic group.
swa: Serikali ya Naijeria imetangaza siku ya Ijumaa kwamba inaufungia mtandao wa Twita nchini humo, siku kadhaa baada ya mtandao huo kufuta twiti hatari iliyoandikwa na Rais wa Naijeria Muhammadu Buhari iliyodai kwamba serikali itatumia nguvu dhidi ya kabila la Igbo.
mt0: The Nigerian government announced on Friday that it is shutting down Twitter in the country, days after the site deleted a threatening tweet by President Muhammadu Buhari that claimed that the government would use force against the Igbo people.

en: Despite removing the tweet, the message continues to circulate on social media, bringing up painful memories of a civil war that left more than one million dead.
swa: Pamoja na kuondolewa kwa twiti hiyo, ujumbe uliendea kusambaa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii, hali iliyokumbushia maumivu ya vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vilivyopoteza maisha ya watu zaidi ya milioni moja.
mt0: With the removal of the tweet, the message continued to spread on social media, which reminded us of the pain of the civil war that killed more than one million people.

en: But the tweet also sparked a movement on social media in support of Nigerians from the Igbo ethnic group.
swa: Lakini twiti hiyo ilichochea harakati kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kusimama na Wanaijeria wa kabila la Igbo.
mt0: But the tweet inspired a movement on social media to stand up for the Iranian people.

en: In a series of tweets posted on June 1, 2021, Buhari threatened to treat Nigerians from the eastern part of the country in the language they understand, in a reference to Nigerias 1967-1970 civil war against the secessionist Republic of Biafra, in southeastern Nigeria.
swa: Kwenye mfululizo wa twiti zilizochapishwa mnamo June 1, 2021, Buhari anatishia kuwashughulikia Wanaijeria wanaotoka kwenye sehemu ya mashariki ya nchi hiyo kwa kutumia lugha wanayoielewa, akirejea vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe nchini Naijeria kati ya mwaka 1967-1970 dhidi ya vuguvugu la kujitenga la Jamhuri ya Biafra, kusini mashariki mwa Naijeria.
mt0: In a series of tweets published on June 1, 2021, Buhari threatens to punish Nigerians from the eastern part of the country with their own language, referring to the 1967-1970 ethnic conflict between Nigeria and the Biafra nationalist movement in south-east Nigeria.

en: The tweets came after a series of attacks on government and security installations in the region, which have been blamed on an armed group linked to the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), a pro-Biafra secessionist movement.
swa: Twiti hiyo iliandikwa baada ya mfululizo wa mashambulio dhidi ya serikali na vyombo vya usalama kwenye eneo hilo, ambalo linalaumiwa kuwa na kikundi cha kijeshi  kinachohusishwa na Wenyeji wa Biafra (IPOB), vuguvugu la watu wanaotaka sehemu ya Biafra ijitenge.
mt0: The tweet was written after a series of attacks on government and security forces in the area, which is alleged to be linked to the Biafra Residents' Organisation (IPOB), a movement of people who want to separate the Biafra region.

en: IPOB denied involvement in the attack, says the Voice of America.
swa: Kikundi hicho kimekanusha kuhusika na mashambulizi hayo, kwa mujibu wa Sauti ya Amerika.
mt0: The group has denied involvement in the attack, according to the United States Broadcasting System.

en: An investigation by the social media forensic expert Digital Africa Research Lab (DigiAfricaLab) reveals that Buharis abusive tweet is still visible across numerous timelines two days after it was deleted by Twitter, due to Quote Tweets:
swa: Uchunguzi uliofanywa na mtaalam wa mtandao ya kijamii wa Digital Africa Research Lab (DigiAfricaLab) unaonesha kwamba twiti ya vitisho iliyoandikwa na Buhari bado inaonekana kwenye akaunti kadhaa siku mbili baada ya kuwa imefutwa na Twita, shauri ya kunukuliwa na watumiaji wengine:
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Over 30 hours after Twitter deleted a Tweet by Nigerian president @MBuhari for violating its rules, the deleted Tweet REMAINS VISIBLE across numerous timelines due to Quote Tweets!
swa: Zaidi ya saa 30 baada ya Twita kufuta twiti ya rais wa Naijeria @MBuhari kwa kosa la kuvunja sheria, twitiiliyofutwa BADO INAONEKANA kwenye akaunti nyingi mtandaoni kwa sababu ya kunukuliwa!
mt0: More than 30 hours after Twitter deleted the tweet of Nigerian President @MBuhari for violating the law, the tweet that was deleted is still visible on many social media accounts because of the leak!

en: Signing onto different accounts through different devices, DigiAfricaLab was still able to view the more than 17,000 quoted tweets made by users before the social media company pulled down the offensive tweets from the timelines of @MBuhari and @NGRPresident, both verified Twitter handles of President Buhari.
swa: Kwa kuingia mtandao kwa kutumia akaunti tofauti kupitia vifaa tofauti, DigiAfricaLab iliweza kuona zaidi ya twiti 17,000 zilizonukuliwa na watumiaji kabla kampuni hiyo ya mtandao wa kijamii haijaifuta twiti hiyo kutoka kwenye akaunti ya @MBuhari na @NGRPresident, zote zikiwa ni anuani za twita zilizohakikiwa zinazotumika na Rais Buhari.
mt0: With a combination of different accounts using different devices, DigiAfricaLab could see more than 17,000 tweets deleted by users before the social media company removed the tweet from @MBuhari and @NGRPresident, both of which are verified Twitter addresses used by President Buhari.

en: Furthermore, DigiAfricaLab was able to click and expand President Buharis deleted tweet.
swa: Zaidi ya hayo, DigiAfricaLab iliweza kubofya na kukuza twiti ya Rais Buhari iliypfutwa.
mt0: Moreover, DigiAfricaLab could analyze and optimize the tweet of President Buhari.

en: Deleted tweets may still be visible to Twitter users because Twitter's software, also called, Application Programming Interface (API) relies on third-party applications that connect to Twitter servers via a URL.
swa: Twiti zil nizofutwa zinaweza kuendelea kuonekana kwa watumiaji wa mtandao wa twita kwa sababu zana inayotumiwa na Twita (API) hutegemea zana za mitandao mingine inayounganisha kazi data za Twita kwa kupitia URL.
mt0: If you cannot translate the tweets, just say you don't know. If you cannot translate the tweets, just say you don't know.

en: Another reason, according to J. D. Biersdorfer of New York Times, was that deleted tweets may still be cached away and therefore available to show up in search results  until the site goes indexing again and updates itself with a fresh copy of your Twitter profile and posts.
swa: Sababu nyingine, kwa mujibu wa  J. D. Biersdorfer wa New York Times, ni kwamba twiti zilizofutwa zinaweza kuwa bado zinapatikana na hivyo kuonekana kwenye matokeo ya utafutaji mtandaoni  mpaka tovuti ihuishwe na nakala mpya ya twiti kwenye ukurasa mkuu wa akaunti husika.
mt0: Other reasons, according to J. D. Biersdorfer of the New York Times, are that deleted tweets can still be found and therefore appear in search results on the Internet until the website is deleted and a new tweet published on the main page of the account.

en: On March 27, a heated debate ensued on Kenyan social media about utterances made on-air by three radio hosts during a breakfast show.
swa: Mnamo Machi 27, mjadala mkali uliibuka kwenye mitandao ya kijamii ya Kenya juu ya matamshi yaliyotolewa hewani na watangazaji wa redio tatu wakati wa kipindi cha asubuhi Breakfast Show.
mt0: On March 27, a controversial debate erupted on Kenyan social media about remarks made by three radio broadcasters during the morning Breakfast Show.

en: The hosts were discussing an ongoing court case involving Eunice Wangari, a woman who was pushed off a 12-floor building by a man with whom she was on a date.
swa: Watangazaji walikuwa wakijadili kesi inayoendelea ya kortini inayomshirikisha Eunice Wangari, mwanamke ambaye alisukumwa nje ya jengo la ghorofa 12 na mwanamume ambaye alikuwa na mahusiano naye.
mt0: The broadcasters were discussing a court case involving Eunice Wangari, a woman who was knocked out of a 12-storey building by a man who had a romantic relationship with her.

en: On Twitter, angered Kenyans lashed out at the presenters Shaffie Weru, Joseph Munoru, and Neville Muysa for their remarks on the case of alleged gender-based violence, and called out the hosts victim-blaming.
swa: Kwenye mtandao wa Twitter, Wakenya wenye hasira waliwaghadhabisha watangazaji Shaffie Weru, Joseph Munoru, na Neville Muysa kwa matamshi yao juu ya kesi ya madai ya unyanyasaji wa kijinsia, na kuwaita watangazaji hao wahanga-wa-kulaumu.
mt0: In the Twitterverse, Kenyans angry with the broadcasters Shaffie Weru, Joseph Munoru, and Neville Muysa for their comments on the sexual assault case, calling them victims of shame.

en: Shaffie is insinuating that the lady who was pushed from the 12th floor of a building in Nairobi CBD after she said no to a man's advancements was because she was too loose & very available hence putting herself is such a situation.
swa: Shaffie anasisitiza kwamba mwanamke huyo alisukumwa kutoka gorofa ya 12 ya jengo jijini Nairobi baada ya kusema hapana kwa mwanamume ni kwa sababu alijiachia sana na kuwa huru kwa hivyo kujiweka mwenyewe katika hali kama hiyo.
mt0: Shaffie insists that the woman who was knocked out of the 12th floor of the building in Nairobi after saying no to a man was because she was free and free to be alone, so she was alone in such a situation.

en: What the actual hell!
swa: Ni kuzimu gani!
mt0: Return only the translated translation. If you cannot translate simply say you don't know what hell is!

en: The case divided online users as a section of citizens took sides with the hosts.
swa: Kesi hii imegawanya watumiaji wa mitandao kwani kuna baadhi yao wanakubaliana na watangazaji hao.
mt0: This case divides the users of social media because some agree with the advertisers.

en: Although the trio was fired by the radio station, it brought to the fore how hostile the Kenyan online space has become for women.
swa: Ingawa watatu hao walifukuzwa kazi na kituo hicho cha redio, ilileta wazi jinsi uhasama wa nafasi mkondoni ya Kenya imekua kwa wanawake.
mt0: Although the three were fired by the radio station, it revealed how a growing row over Kenyan women's online positions has become.

en: There are about 21.75 million internet users in Kenya, or 40 percent of the country's population, according to 2021 data by research firm DataReportal.
swa: Kuna takribani watumiaji 21.75 milioni wa mitandao nchini Kenya, au asilimia 40 ya idadi ya watu nchini kulingana na utafiti wa data uliofanywa na kampuni ya DataReportal mwaka 2021.
mt0: Return to the translated sentence only. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Around 11 million of those use social media, an increase of 2.2 percent compared to 2020.
swa: Karibu watu milioni 11 ni watumiaji ya mitandao ya kijamii, ongezeko la asilimia 2.2 ukilinganisha na mwaka 2020.
mt0: About 11 million people are social media users, an increase of 2.2 percent from 2020.

en: According to another report by Global System for Mobile Communications (GSMA), while mobile phone ownership is almost equally matched between men and women  with only five percent more men than women owning or having access to the gadget , only one in every three internet users in Kenya is a woman.
swa: Kutokana na ripoti nyingine ya Mfumo wa kimataifa wa mawasiliano ya simu (GSMA), idadi ya umiliki wa simu za mikononi ni karibu sawa kwa wanawake na wanaume ikiwa na tofauti ya asilimia tano zaidi kwa wanaume wanaomiliki au wenye uwezo wa kupata vyombo vya mawasiliano ukilinganisha na wanawake, kwenye watumiaji watatu wa mitandao nchini Kenya mmoja wao ni mwanamke.
mt0: According to another report by the International Communication System (ICS), the number of women owning mobile phones is almost the same as men, with a five-percent difference between men who own or have access to mobile phones compared to women, among the three users of mobile networks in Kenya one is a woman.

en: As an online minority, women in Kenya are often targets of cyberbullying.
swa: Kama wachache mkondoni, mara nyingi wanawake nchini Kenya wamekua lengo la uonevu wa kimtandao.
mt0: As few online, women in Kenya are often targeted by online bullying.

en: And although in 2018 the country passed a law against cyberbullying  which defines the behaviour as interacting with others in a manner that is likely to cause [] apprehension or fear of violence to them or damage or loss on that persons property  with penalties of up to 10 years in prison, mass online trolling still runs rampant.
swa: Na ingawa mwaka 2018 sheria dhidi ya unyanyasaji wa kimtandao ilipitishwa nchini  ambayo hufafanua tabia kama kushirikiana na wengine kwa njia ambayo inaweza kusababisha wasiwasi au hofu ya vurugu kwao au uharibifu au upotezaji wa mali ya watu hao kwa adhabu ya hadi miaka 10 jela, bado uonevu wa watu wengi mtandaoni bado imekithiri sana.

en: After doing media interviews in April 2020, she was subjected to online harassment and backlash from Kenyans on Twitter (or famously #KOT, a term often used to describe the collective of active Kenyans online known to rally against various causes or personalities) who sought to discredit and question the truth behind her story.

en: An article by The Elephant, one of Kenyas foremost digital publications, noted that online social network spheres in Kenya and globally have turned to be the frontiers for toxic expressions and harassment.
swa: Makala ya The Elephant,  moja ya chapisho kuu la kidijitali nchini Kenya, ilibaini kuwa nyanja za mtandao wa kijamii mkondoni nchini Kenya na ulimwenguni zimegeuka kuwa mipaka ya maneno yenye sumu na unyanyasaji.
mt0: The Elephant, one of the most influential digital publications in Kenya, found that social media channels in Kenya and across the world have become a border for toxic and abusive words.

en: There is no gainsaying that social media has become an important tool for social and professional advancement, more so for women.
swa: Hakuna ubishi kwamba mitandao ya kijamii imekuwa nyenzo muhimu kwa maendeleo ya kijamii na kitaalam, zaidi kwa wanawake.
mt0: There is no doubt that social media has been a significant tool for social and scientific development, especially for women.

en: Many women have built their businesses online and, in the process, have learned how to connect with others.
swa: Wanawake wengi wamejenga biashara zao mkondoni na, katika mchakato huo, wamejifunza jinsi ya kuungana na wengine.
mt0: Many women have built their own online business and, in the process, have learned to connect with others.

en: Many find clients to buy and sell their products online.
swa: Wengi hupata wateja wa kununua na kuuza bidhaa zao mkondoni.
mt0: Many customers find customers to buy and sell their products online.

en: Others find platforms to incubate ideas, leading to hundreds if not millions of social enterprises that not only spur economic growth but directly empower young men and women economically.
swa: Wengine hupata majukwaa ya kuwezesha maoni, na kusababisha mamia kama sio mamilioni ya biashara za kijamii ambazo sio tu zinazochochea ukuaji wa uchumi lakini zinawawezesha moja kwa moja wanaume na wanawake wadogo kiuchumi.
mt0: Some get forums to encourage opinions, and cause thousands or even millions of social business which not only stimulate economic growth but also directly benefits very young men and women.

en: They have also learned how to improve their entrepreneurship skills online.
swa: Wamejifunza pia jinsi ya kuboresha ujuzi wao wa ujasiriamali mkondoni.
mt0: They also learned how to improve their online business skills.

en: No doubt then, social media has emerged as a great space to do business.

en: Caribbean nations have, one by one, been readjusting their law books to reflect greater equity for LGBTQ+ people by decriminalising colonial-era sodomy clauses.
swa: Nchi za Caribiani, moja baada ya nyingine, zimekuwa zikirekebisha vitabu vyake vya sheria kuakisi usawa zaidi kwa watu wenye kupenda mapenzi ya jinsia moja kwa kuondoa vipengele vya enzi za ukoloni vilivyokuwa vinazuia tabia ya kuingiliana kinyume na maumbile.
mt0: Caribbean countries, one after another, have been changing their laws to ensure more equality for people who love one another by removing the colonial elements that prevented a desire to have sex against nature.

en: In 2016, it was Belize.
swa: Mwaka 2016, ilianza nchi ya Belize.
mt0: In 2016, it began in Belize.

en: Two years later, Trinidad and Tobago followed suit, but the ripple effect of dismantling connected pieces of legislation has been slower in coming.
swa: Miaka miwili baadae, Trinidad na Tobago ikafuatia, ingawa hatua yake hiyo haijatafsirika kwenye mabadiliko ya sheria.
mt0: Two years later, Trinidad and Tobago followed, though its action was not translated into a constitutional change.

en: Three years after the court deemed the country's buggery laws unconstitutional, Trinidad and Tobago's Equal Opportunity Act (EOA) finally looks set to amend its regulations pertaining to sexual orientation.
swa: Miaka mitatu baada ya mahakama kutamka wazi kwamba sheria hizo zinakwenda kinyume na katiba, hatimaye Trinadad na Tobago inaonekana iko njiani kurekebisha kanuni za Sheria ya Fursa Sawa (EOA) zinazohusiana na ushoga.
mt0: Three years after the court clearly ruled that these laws were against the constitution, finally, Trinadad and Tobago appears to be moving to amend the Equal Opportunity Act (EOA) related to gay marriage.

en: The Act's self-proclaimed purpose is to prohibit certain kinds of discrimination and promote equality of opportunity between persons of different status.
swa: Sheria hiyo ina lengo linalosomekana kama, kuzuia aina fulani za ubaguzi na kukuza usawa wa fursa baina ya watu wenye hali tofauti.
mt0: The law has a objective that is viewed as, to prevent some forms of discrimination and to promote equal opportunity between people of different backgrounds.

en: To this end, an Equal Opportunity Commission and an Equal Opportunity Tribunal were established to handle such issues but so far, neither body has been unable to deal with matters of discrimination based on sexual orientation.
swa: Kwa minajili ya lengo hiyo,  Tume ya Fursa na Mahakama ya Fursa Sawa zilianzishwa ili kushughulikia masuala hayo lakini mpaka sasa, vyombo hivyo vinashindwa kushughulikia masuala ya ubaguzi dhidi ya ushoga.
mt0: For that reason, the Equal Opportunity Commission and the Equal Rights Court were established to deal with the issue but until now, these bodies have failed to deal with the issue of prejudice against homosexuality.

en: The current laws only cover discrimination based on sex, race, ethnicity, origin, religion, marital status, or disability in matters of employment, training, education, and the like.
swa: Sheria zilizopo zinashughulikia ubaguzi wa kijinsia, rangi, kabila, asili, dini, hali ya ndoa, au ulemavu kwenye masuala ya ajira, mafunzo, elimu na kadhalika.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know. The existing laws relate to racial, sex, race, ethnicity, religion, marriage status, or disability in the employment, training, education and so on.

en: Pressure to amend the current Act mounted after Scotiabank Trinidad and Tobago announced on April 14 that it would extend its health benefits to the partners of employees in same-sex relationships, in the same way it already offered access to the common-law partners of heterosexual employees.
swa: Shinikizo la kurekebisha Sheria ya sasa liliongezeka baada ya Benki ya Scotiabank nchini Trinidad na Tobago kutangaza mnamo Aprili 14 kwamba itapanua wigo wa huduma za afya kwa wenzi wa waajiriwa walio kwenye mahusiano ya jinsia moja, kwa namna ile ile ilivyo kwa wenzi wa waajiriwa wa jinsia tofauti.
mt0: The pressure to amend the current law rose after Scotiabank in Trinidad and Tobago announced on April 14 that it would extend health insurance for partners in same sex relationships, just as it would extend for partners in other sex relationships.

en: The announcement sparked a nationwide conversation and was praised by the American Chamber of Commerce (AMCHAM) and Ian Roach, chairman of the Equal Opportunity Commission, who noted in an interview with the Trinidad and Tobago Newsday:
swa: Tangazo hilo liliibua majadiliano makali nchini humo na pia kupongezwa na Chemba ya Biashara ya Marekani (AMCHAM) na Ian Roach, mwenyekiti wa Tume ya Fursa Sawa, aliyenukuliwa katika majadiliano yake na gazeti la Newsday la Trinidad na Tobago akisema:
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: It is a good move on the part of the private sector and especially by the bank, who has a wide cross-section of employees.
swa: Ni hatua nzuri kwa upande wa sekta binafsi na hasa kwa benki, ambayo ina waajiriwa wa aina mbalimbali.
mt0: It is a good step for the private sector and especially for the bank, which has a wide variety of employees.

en: It is important that the others should follow suit, past what the law insists.
swa: Ni muhimu na wengine wakaiga hatua hii, pamoja na kile ambacho sheria inasisitiza.
mt0: It is important that others follow this step, along with what the law stresses.

en: Attorney General Faris Al-Rawi has said he is encouraged by Scotiabank's inclusive initiative and remains open to doing what is necessary to address the spectrums of discrimination that exist.
swa: Mwanasheria Mkuu wa Serikali Faris Al-Rawi amesema ametiwa moyo na hatua hiyo ya Benki ya Scotiabank kulinda haki za watu na kwamba milango iko wazi kufanya kile kinachohitajika ili kuondoa aina mbalimbali za ubaguzi unaoendelea kuwepo nchini humo.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Al-Rawi's stance is markedly different from his position after the 2018 High Court ruling; soon after the unconstitutional verdict was handed down, the state announced its intention to appeal.
swa: Msimamo huo wa Al-Rawi unaonekana kubadilika kulingana na msimamo aliokuwa nao baada ya Hukumu ya Mahakama Kuu ya 2018; mara tu baada ya uamuzi usio wa kikatiba kutolewa, serikali ilitangaza nia yake ya kukata rufaa.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know. The position of Al-Rawi appears to have changed since the 2018 High Court ruling; just after the unconstitutional ruling was announced, the government announced its intention to appeal.

en: While Trinidad and Tobago has undeniably made great strides when it comes to discrimination for members of the local LGBTQ+ community, homophobiamuch of it rationalised on religious groundsstill exists.
swa: Wakati Trinidad na Tobago zimefanya maendeleo makubwa kwenye kuondoa aina mbalimbali za ubaguzi, lakini linapokuja suala la ubaguzi dhidi ya mashoga wa nchi hiyo, hofu ya mashogakwa kutumia hoja za kidinibado hali haijabadilika sana.
mt0: While Trinidad and Tobago have made significant progress in abolishing various forms of discrimination, when it comes to discrimination against gays in the country, the fear of gays using religious arguments still remains.

en: Public reactions to Scotiabank's announcement on social media networking platforms like Facebook were met with lots of criticism.
swa: Kwa kutazama mwitikio wa wananchi dhidi ya tangazo la Benki ya Scotiabank kwenye majukwaa ya mitandao ya kijamii kama Facebook upinzani ulikuwa mkubwa.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Meanwhile, LGBTQ+ people continue to face not just discrimination, but acts of violence, many of them ending fatally.
swa: Wakati huo huo, mashoga wanaendelea si tu kukabiliana na ubaguzi, lakini pia vitendo vya ukatili, vingi vikiishia kwa kupoteza maisha.
mt0: While the same goes for gays, they continue to face not only prejudice, but also violence, often ending in death.

en: Most recently, the murder of Marcus Anthony Singh, a member of the local LGBTQ+ community, sparked online conversations about the reality that many LGBTQ+ people face in terms of both security and discriminatory practices.
swa: Katika tukio la hivi karibuni,  kifo cha Marcus Anthony Singh, mwanachama wa chama cha mashoga kwenye eneo analoishi, kiliibua mjadala mzito mtandao kuhusu mazingira magumu ambayo mashoga wanakabiliana nayo hususani usalama wao sambamba na vitendo vya ubaguzi.
mt0: In the recent case, the death of Marcus Anthony Singh, a gay activist in his neighborhood, sparked a debate on the internet about the difficulties faced by gays, particularly their safety and their persecution.

en: Many of those conversations have been happening on Twitter Spaces, which provide an audio-only chat forum for safe discussion and education.
swa: Mazungumzo hayo mengi yamekuwa yakifanyika kupitia teknolojia ya Twitter Spaces, jukwaa la mazungumzo ya sauti linalowezesha mijadala na elimu salama.
mt0: Many of these conversations have been conducted through the technology of Twitter Spaces, a voice chat platform that allows discussions and safe education.

en: While Attorney General Al Rawi has not provided a timeline by which the amendments to the legislation will be tackled, for the LGBTQ+ community and its allies, the hope remains that moves by private sector companies like Scotiabank will soon be followed by the government, eventually leading to societal change.
swa: Wakati Mwanasheria Mkuu wa Serikali Al Rawi hajatoa muda rasmi wa kufanyika mabadiliko hayo ya sheria, kwa mashoga na washirika wao, matumaini yanabaki kwamba huenda hatua zinazochukuliwa na makampuni binafsi kama Benki ya Scotiabank si muda mrefu zitaanza kuchukuliwa na serikali, na hatimaye kuleta mabadiliko yenye sura ya jamii nzima.
mt0: While the Attorney General Al Rawi has not given a formal timeframe for the changes to the laws, for gays and their partners, hope remains that the actions taken by private companies such as Scotiabank in the short term will be taken by the government, and eventually bring about a change that would have a positive impact on the whole society.

en: For internet and technology companies, collecting user data remains one of their main sources of income.
swa: Kwa kampuni za mtandao wa intaneti na teknolojia, ukusanyaji wa taarifa za watumiaji wa mtandao wa intaneti umekuwa ni chanzo chao kikuu cha kujipatia kipato.
mt0: For internet companies and technology companies, the collection of Internet users' information has become a major source of income.

en: But this business model includes a security risk for users, as demonstrated by recurring cases of undisclosed commercial use, massive leaks, and hacking incidents.
swa: Hata hivyo, namna hii ya kujipatia kipato inawaweka hatarini watumiaji kama inavyojidhihirisha katika matukio ya mara kwa mara ya uwekaji wazi wa taarifa za kibiashara, uvujaji mkubwa wa taarifa na udukuaji.
mt0: But this way of earning money is dangerous to users as it shows in frequent cases of being exposed to corporate information, massive leakages of information, and illegal exploitation.

en: Is there a credible solution for strengthening users privacy?

mt0: Is there a way to improve the privacy of Internet users?

en: Companies such as Google and Apple focus on collecting daily user data, mostly via smartphones, and combining information from the applications running over time: the user's contacts and agenda, for example.

en: In fact, most users do not realize they are offering a wealth of data to service providers and platform owners, free of charge.

en: This was perhaps best illustrated by the Facebook scandal known as the Cambridge Analytica case  in which British consulting firm Cambridge Analytica obtained the personal data of 87 million Facebook users without consent, in order to provide analytical assistance to the 2016 presidential campaigns of Ted Cruz and Donald Trump.
swa: Moja ya matukio kama haya pengine yameelezwa vizuri sana kupitia tukio la skendo ya Facebook linalofahamika kama kesi ya Cambridge Analytica ambapo Taasisi binafsi ya ushauri ya Cambridge Analytica ilijikusanyia taarifa binafsi za watumiaji milioni 87 wa Facebook bila idhini yao kwa lengo la  kuwasaidia wagombea kiti cha Urais Ted Cruz na Donald Trump mapema mwaka 2016.
mt0: One of these cases may be best explained by the Facebook scandal known as the Cambridge Analytica case where a private consultancy collected 87 million Facebook users' personal information without their consent to help Democratic presidential candidates Ted Cruz and Donald Trump in 2016.

swa: Schrems anasema kuwa aliwatahadharisha wawakilishi wa Facebook kuhusu matukio ya ukusanyaji taarifa za wateja wao uliokuwa unafanywa na taasisi ya Cambridge Analytica, na hata hivyo, hakuweza kuwashawishi kuchukua hatua:
mt0: Schrems says he warned Facebook representatives about the cases of their customers' data collection by the Cambridge Analytica organization, but he could not persuade them to take action:

Facebook representatives without a doubt said that in their opinion, when you use a particular owner's platform, you are allowing those users to download their own applications [on mobile devices and other devices] to collect user data.

swa: Mhandisi wa Kifaransa wa vitumizi vya kompyuta na mtaalam wa masuala ya data, Gaël Duval amejihusisha kwa muda mrefu katika uundaji wa vitumizi vya kompyuta ikiwa ni pamoja na kitumizi cha Linux cha Mandrake ambao ni mfumo endeshi(wenye mrengo wa keneli ya Linux) ambao kila mtu ana haki ya kuuboresha na kisha kutumiwa na wengine.

French computer engineer and data expert, Gaël Duval has been involved for a long time in the development of computer programs including the Linux distribution of Mandrake which is a distribution (based on the Linux family) which each person has the right to modify and then use it by others.

en: Global Voices spoke to him to understand how communication technology impacts lives, and present both an opportunity and a risk.
swa: Global Voices iliongea naye ili kufahamu namna teknolojia ya habari inavyoathiri maisha ya watu, fursa zilizopo na madhara yake.

en: Here is his view on the evolution of such technology:
swa: Huu hapa ni mtazamo wake kuhusu maendeleo ya teknolojia hii ya habari:

en: This is a philosophical question.
swa: Hili ni swali la kifalsafa.
mt0: This is a philosophical question.

en: I personally have very mixed feelings about it because I've always been passionate about technology.
swa: Binafsi nina hisia  mchanganyiko haswa kuhusu teknolojia ya habari kwa kuwa, mimi wakati wote nina mahaba makubwa kuhusu teknolojia.
mt0: I have mixed feelings about technology, especially about information technology because I always have a great love for technology.

en: But at the same time, I feel that sometimes it's too much, and I miss the time when you had to find a phone booth to have a call.
swa: Hata hivyo, kuna wakati ninahisi kuchoshwa, ninakumbuka nyakati zile ambazo ukihitaji kupiga simu, unaenda sehemu maalum iliyotengwa.
mt0: But sometimes I feel tired, I remember when you need to call, you go to a specific place.

en: It was probably a more carefree and [slower-paced] life.
swa: Bila shaka yale yalikuwa maisha murua kabisa na yasiyo na haraka.
mt0: That was probably the most beautiful and slow life I've ever had.

en: Younger people might be surprised to know that until I was five, there was no phone at home and no television.
swa: Vijana wanaweza kushangaa kuwa, hadi nilipofikisha miaka mitano, nyumbani hakukuwa na simu wala runinga.
mt0: Young people may wonder that, until I was five years old, there was no phone or television in the house.

en: So sometimes I feel I lived a part of my life in a totally different world, that doesn't exist anymore.
swa: Kuna wakati ninawaza kuwa niliishi maisha ya ulimwengu tofauti kabisa,  na ambayo kwa sasa hayapo kabisa.
mt0: I sometimes think I've lived in a completely different world, and that's not the case now.

en: On the other hand, it's really exciting to see what we can do with modern technology, like having an HD video call with someone on the other side of the planet, and seeing all those electric cars that, at least, are not burning petrol and [filling] our lungs with the exhaust fumes.
swa: Kwa upande mwingine, inafurahisha sana haswa tunapojaribu kuwaza ni jambo gani tunaweza kufanya kwa uwepo wa teknolojia za kisasa, kama vile kuwasiliana na mtu aliye sehemu tofauti kabisa ya ulimwengu kupitia picha za video za ubora wa hali ya juu sambamba na kushuhudia magari ya umeme yasiyotumia petroli inayojaza mapafu yetu kwa moshi hatari.
mt0: In the other hand, it is very interesting to think about what we can do with the existence of advanced technology, such as communicating with someone in a completely different part of the world through high-quality video images and seeing electric cars that don't use petrol that fill our lungs with harmful smoke.

en: Besides the seductive dangers of nostalgia for those who still remember analog times, we are also facing a real risk of dependence on information technology.
swa: Kwa wale wanaokumbuka, ukiachilia raha na karaha za miaka ya kipindi cha mfumo wa analogia, kwa sasa tunakabiliana na hatari kubwa ya utegemezi kwenye teknolojia ya habari.
mt0: For those who remember, taking the pleasures and pains of the analogy era, we are now in great danger of being dependent on information technology.

en: A 2018 study linked behavioral problems in children with excessive use of smartphones, which was shown to cause issues including attention deficit disorder (ADD) and depression.
swa: Utafiti uliofanyika mwaka 2018 uliohusisha  matatizo ya kitabia ya watoto na mazoea yaliyopitiliza ya matumizi ya simu janja , ulibaini kuwa, matumizi makubwa ya simu janja hupelekea matatizo kadha wa kadha yakiwemo Tatizo la Kukosa Umakini (ADD) na sonona.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know. A 2018 study focused on the psychology of children and the use of mobile phones , found that a significant amount of mobile phones causes a number of problems including ADD and sleep apnea.

en: The risk inherent in our use of such technology was recently openly acknowledged by insiders from the industry in the Netflix documentary The Social Dilemma, which includes testimonials from former employees of Big Tech  including Google, Twitter and Facebook  explaining how they purposefully nurtured user addiction for profit.
swa: Madhara yatokanayo na matumizi ya teknolojia hizi hivi karibuni yaliwekwa bayana na vyanzo vya kuaminika katika makala ya Netflix ya  The Social Dilemma, ambayoinayoelezea ushuhuda wa wafanyakazi wa zamani wa kampuni kubwa zikiwemo Google, Twitter na Facebook  wanaoelezea ni kwa namna gani walivyokuwa wanaweka mazingira ya kushawishi mtumiaji kujenga uraibu wa vutumizi kwa minajili ya vipato.

en: Some governments have reacted by upgrading protective legislation in order to both raise user awareness and place more responsibility on technology companies.
swa: Baadhi ya serikali zimejaribu kukabiliana na tatizo hili kwa kuboresha sheria ili kujenga uelewa wa watumiaji sambamba na kuongeza uwajibikaji kwa makampuni husika.
mt0: Some governments have tried to address this problem by changing laws to increase user awareness and to increase responsibility for the companies involved.

en: In May 2018, the European Union passed the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
swa: Mwaka 2018, Umoja wa Ulaya (EU) ulipitisha  Sheria Mama ya Ulinzi wa Taarifa (GDPR).
mt0: In 2018, the European Union (EU) passed the basic Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

en: The law adds multiple constraints to data management, such as asking users for explicit authorization for the use of their data and requiring companies to remove this data after a period of three years without interaction.
swa: Sheria hii imeongeza matakwa kadhaa kuhusu utunzaji wa taarifa ikiwamo kupata ridhaa isiyo na shaka ya mtumiaji kuhusu taarifa zake na kuyataka makampuni husika kuondoa taarifa hizi baada ya kipindi cha miaka mitatu bila kushurutishwa.
mt0: This law has added a number of requirements regarding the conservation of information including the ability to obtain the user's explicit consent to the information he holds and requiring the companies to remove the information after three years without being forced.

en: It also introduces extremely large fines for those who do not respect these rules.
swa: Pia, sheria hii imeweka fidia kubwa kwa wale ambao hawataheshimu kanuni hizi.
mt0: The same laws have also established a large fine for those who do not obey these rules.

en: But its enforcement is limited by a lack of resources to do so among local authorities, and it is, of course, only applicable in EU member states.
swa: Hata hivyo, utekelezaji wake unakabiliwa na ukosefu wa vitendea kazi katika mamlaka za serikali, na pia, sheria hii inayahusu tu mataifa wanachama wa Umoja wa Ulaya.
mt0: But its implementation is being hampered by a lack of technical assistance in government agencies, and also, this law applies only to European Union members.

en: /e/ is a digital ecosystem that provides a smartphone operating system that doesn't send [to Google] any piece of your personal data, like your searches, your geolocation and that respects users data privacy.
swa: /e/ ni mfumo endeshi msawazo wa kidigitali wa simu janja ambao hautumi taarifa yoyote [kwenda Google] kama vile unapoperuzi, mahali ulipo na unaozingatia faragha ya mtumiaji.
mt0: /e/ is a digital thinking system for mobile phones that doesn't use any information [to Google] as you browse, where you are and which respects the privacy of the user.

en: It doesn't look at the user's data for any purpose.
swa: Mfumo huu haukagui kwa namna yoyote taarifa binafsi za mtumiaji.

en: It also provides basic online services such as an email address, some storage, a calendar, a way to store your contacts  everything linked with the smartphone operating system.

mt0: You also provide basic Internet services such as email, storage, calendar, backup and everything related to the mobile phone system.

en: Duval said that when it comes to personal data, Google and Apple are in the same boat  this data fuels Google's business model, which is essentially based on selling advertising, while Apple, despite claiming to protect its users privacy, receives an estimated 8 billion to 12 billion US dollars each year to pre-install Google search on iPhones and iPads.
swa: Duval anasema kwamba, linapokuja suala la taarifa binafsi za mtu, Google na Apple wana malengo yanayofanana  taarifa hizi zinapalilia mfumo wa kibiashara wa Google, ambao kimsingi unategemea  bilioni 8 hadi 12 kila mwaka kwa ajili ya kuweka kitumizi cha kuperuzi cha Google kwenye iPhones na iPads.
mt0: Duval says that, when it comes to personal data, Google and Apple have the same goals. These data are driving Google's business model, which essentially relies on 8 to 12 billion dollars a year to install Google's search app on iPhones and iPads.

en: Kenyas COVID-19 vaccination rollout has been mired by allegations of bribery, line cutting and corruption that have left poor and elderly citizens waiting in long queues outside public hospitals even as the country grapples with a third wave of infections and deaths.
swa: Kuanza kutolewa kwa chanjo ya UVIKO-19 nchini Kenya kumegubikwa na tuhuma za vitendo vya rushwa, upendeleo na ufisadi ambavyo vimewaacha wananchi wengi masikini na wazee wakisubiri kwenye mistari mirefu nje ya hospitali za umma wakati huu ambao nchi hiyo inakabiliwa na mlipuko wa tatu wa maambukizi na vifo vinavyotokana na UVIKO-19.
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: Meanwhile, hundreds of well-connected Kenyans are paying anything up to $100 to secretly receive early inoculations, as documented through eyewitness accounts by various Kenyans online and news coverage in Kenyan and international media.
swa: Wakati huo huo, mamia ya Wakenya wanalipa kiasi cha hadi dola 100 ili waweze kuitwa mapema, kama ilivyoelezwa kwenye akaunti kadhaa za Wakenya mtandaoni sambamba na vyombo vya habari vya Kenya na vile vya kimataifa.
mt0: At the same time, hundreds of Kenyans are paying up to $100 to be called early, as reported on several Kenyan social media accounts and international media.

en: In early March, Kenya procured over 1 million doses of Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine doses through the COVID-19 Vaccines Global Access initiative, a World Health Organization-backed global vaccine distribution effort known as COVAX.
swa: Mapema mwezi Machi, Kenya ilinunua zaidi ya dozi milioni 1 za chanjo ya Oxford-AstraZeneca kupitia mpango wa Upatikanaji wa Chanjo ya UVIKO-19 Duniani, inayoratibiwa na Shirika la Afya Duniani kupitia utaratibu unaoitwa COVAX.
mt0: Early in March, Kenya purchased over 1 million doses of Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine through the World Vaccine Access Program, which is sponsored by the World Health Organization through the COVAX program.

en: The delivery marked the start of a campaign to offer the vaccine free of charge at select public and private hospitals.
swa: Kupokelewa kwa chanjo hizo kulianzisha kampeni ya kutoa chanjo bure katika hospitali teule za umma na binafsi.
mt0: The introduction of the vaccines started a campaign to freely give vaccines in selected public and private hospitals.

en: The rollout was broken down into three phases: healthcare workers and security and immigration officials, citizens over age 58 and adults with certain medical conditions, and other citizens in vulnerable conditions such as those living in informal settlements.

en: The country is set to receive 24 million doses through COVAX.

en: It plans to vaccinate 50 percent of the population by June 2022 through a combination of COVAX vaccines and donations from other countries, reports The Washington Post.

mt0: According to the Washington Post, Kenya is aiming to reach 50 percent of its population by June 2022 through cooperation between the COVAX project and other aid.

en: In a press release, UNICEF Representative to Kenya Maniza Zaman celebrated the arrival of the first vaccines in Kenya.

en: With the arrival of these vaccines, UNICEF and partners are honouring the promise of the COVAX facility to ensure people from less wealthy countries are not left behind in the global rollout of life-saving vaccines, she said.

en: However, this elaborately planned three-phase rollout fell apart as soon as the exercise began because of a last-minute government decision to fast-track phase two in response to the third wave, conflicting politically charged interests, and the states failure to consult and inform citizens.
swa: Hata hivyo, mpango huu wa tatu ulivurugika mara baada ya zoezi kuanza kwa sababu ya uamuzi wa dakika za mwisho wa kuharakisha awamu ya pili ya mpango huyo kama namna ya kukabiliana na wimbi la tatu la maambukizi, maslahi ya kisiasa yanayokinzana, na serikali kushindwa kuwasiliana na kuwajulisha wananchi.
mt0: But this third plan was interrupted after the exercise began because of the last minute decision to accelerate the second stage of the plan as a way to cope with the third wave of infection, political differences, and the government's failure to communicate and inform the public.

mt0: In his article asking what is happening in the vaccination program in Kenya, Patrick Gathara, a Kenyan writer and political cartoonist who won several prizes, said: "If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know."

en: Politicians loudly and self-servingly argued that they should be given priority to inspire confidence among the population, even though the Ministry of Health was reporting encountering little resistance.
swa: Kwa sauti kubwa na ubinafsi, wanasiasa walidai kwamba wao ndio wanaopaswa kupewa kipaumbele ili kuwajengea imani wananchi, ingawa Wizara ya Afya tayari ilisharipoti kutokuwepo kwa upinzani mkubwa wa chanjo hiyo.
mt0: With a loud voice and arrogance, politicians argued that they should be prioritized to establish confidence among the people, even though the Health Ministry had already reported a huge opposition to the vaccination.

en: Because the state had ignored the need to explain its plan to the population, there was widespread confusion about where and when people were expected to be in line.
swa: Kwa kuwa serikali imepuuza takwa la kueleza mpango wake kwa wananchi, kulikuwa na mkanganyiko mkubwa kuhusu wapi na lini watu wanatarajiwa kusimama kwenye mstari.
mt0: Since the government has failed to explain its plan to the people, there was a great confusion about where and when people were expected to stand up.

en: Despite government directives prioritizing citizens over the age of 58, Kenyan media reported that businessmen and politicians not in this age group have found a way to get the jab early, exposing the country's rich-poor divide.
swa: Pamoja na maelekezo ya serikali  kuwapa kipaumbele wananchi wenye umri wa zaidi ya miaka 58,  vyombo vya habari nchini Kenya viliripoti kwamba wafanyabiashara na wanasiasa wasio kwenye kundi la umri huu wamekuwa wakipata huduma kinyume na utaratibu, hali inayoonesha ubaguzi mkubwa wa masikini unaofanywa na wenye fedha.
mt0: Although the government has ordered a special priority for older people, Kenyan media reports that businessmen and politicians who are not in this group have been getting services without a routine, indicating a huge margin of exploitation of the poor by the rich.

en: Meanwhile, eligible senior citizens and poor Kenyans, who aren't well connected and don't have money to pay a bribe, often wait in line all day starting at 5 a.m., only to be asked to return the following day because the doses are finished, according to The Washington Post.
swa: Wakati huo huo, wazee wanaostahili na Wakenya maskini, ambao hawana mtandao wa watu wa kuwasaidia na wasio na fedha za kuhonga,  huonekana wakingoja kwenye mstari siku zote kuanzia saa 11 alfajiri, na kuishia kuombwa warudi siku nyingine kwa sababu dawa zimeisha, kwa mujibu wa habari iliyoandikwa na jarida la The Washington Post.
mt0: However, elderly and poor citizens and those who are not able to find a support network and without money to bribe, are often waiting in line all day starting at 11am, and being asked to return another day because the medicine has run out, according to a report published by the Washington Post.

en: They have another door for their friends, Mary Njoroge, 58, one of the teachers, told The Washington Post.
swa: Wana mlango mwingine kwa marafiki zao, Mary Njoroge, 58, mmoja wa walimu, aliliambia The Washngton Post.
mt0: They have another door to their friends, Mary Njoroge, 58, a teacher, told the Washington Post.

en: Without a godfather to help you through this process, what are you supposed to do?
swa: Bila kuwa na mtu wa kukusaidia kukamilisha mchakato wote, utafanya nini?
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: A similar incident in another government hospital was reported by @_Sativa, a Twitter user based in Nairobi, Kenyan.
swa: Tukio kama hilo liliripotiwa kwenye hospitali nyingine ya serikali na @_Sativa, mtumiaji wa Twita anayeishi Nairobi, ambaye pia ni Mkenya.
mt0: @Sativa, a Twitter user who lives in Nairobi, Kenya, also reported the same incident at another government hospital.

en: In a Twitter thread, he recounted the experience of his aunt, a retired teacher in her 60s.
swa: Kwenye uzi huo wa Twita, alielezea kile ambacho shangazi yake alikutana nacho, mwalimu mstaafu mwenye zaidi ya miaka 60.
mt0: In that tweet, he explained what his grandmother met, a retired teacher who was over 60.

en: While elderly people waited in line, a nurse called out names and young people came to the front to get vaccinated.
swa: Wakati wazee wakisubiri mstarini, muuguzi aliita majina na vijana walikuja mbele na wakatangulia kupata chanjo.
mt0: While the old waited in line, the doctor called the names and the younger ones came ahead and got vaccinated.

en: When his aunt asked what was happening, the nurse gave her a number where she could send money, he said in his Twitter thread.
swa: Shangazi yake alipouliza nini kinaendelea, muuguzi alimpa namba [ya simu] ambayo angeweza kutumia fedha, alisema kwenye uzi huo wa Twitter.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know. When his grandmother asked what was happening, the doctor gave him a number [of phone] that he could use to pay for it, he wrote on Twitter.

en: Following reports of increased enthusiasm from the public for the vaccination campaign, Kenyas Cabinet Secretary for Health, Mutahi Kagwe told the media:
swa: Kufuatia taarifa za kuongezeka kwa hamasa ya watu kwa kampeni hiyo ya chanjo, Waziri wa Afya wa Kenya, Mutahi Kagwe aliviambia vyombo vya habari:
mt0: After reports of a growing interest in the vaccination campaign, Kenyan Health Minister Mutahi Kagwe told the press: "If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know."

en: I think somewhere along the line we seem to have developed some confusion that anybody can walk into a vaccination centre and get vaccines.
swa: Nadhani tumefika mahali tumetengeneza hali ya sintofahamu kwamba mtu yeyote anaweza kwenda kwenye kituo cha kutolea chanjo na kupata huduma.
mt0: I think we've reached a point where we've created a false sense that anybody can go to the vaccination center and get a service.

en: I want to make it very clear, those carrying out vaccination will have to account for every dose that they have used and that dose that they have used must be matched against an eligible person.
swa: Ninataka kuliweka suala hili vizuri, wale wanaotoa huduma ya chanjo watatoa hesabu ya kila dawa waliyoitumia na kwamba dawa zilizotumika lazima zioanishwe na mtu anayestahili huduma hiyo.
mt0: I want to explain this well, the providers of vaccination services will give a detailed account of every drug they used and that the drugs used must be shared with the person who is eligible for the vaccination.

en: The National Nurses Association of Kenya president Alfred Obengo pleaded with Kenyans who are not on the priority list to avoid queuing for the vaccine.
swa: Rais wa Chama cha Taifa cha Wauguzi nchini Kenya Alfred Obengo aliwaomba Wakenya wasio kwenye orodha ya kipaumbele kuepuka kusimama kwenye foleni ya chanjo.
mt0: Alfred Obengo, the president of the Kenyan National Doctors' Association, asked those not on the priorities list to avoid waiting in line for vaccines.

en: In providing clarity on how the Kenyan government could have avoided this confusion in its rollout plan, Gathara concludes his article by saying:
swa: Akifafanua namna serikali ya Kenya ingeweza kuepuka mkanganyiko huo katika kutekeleza mpango huo,  Gathara anahitimisha makala yake kwa kusema:
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Much of this could have been avoided if the Kenyan government and its global partners, including the World Health Organization and Western governments, treated Kenyans as partners in the rollout rather than colonial subjects to be brutalised and exploited.
swa: Tungeweza kuepuka kadhia hii kama serikali ya Kenya na washirika wake duniani, ikiwa ni pamoja na Shirika la Afya Duniani na serikali za nchi za magharibi, zingefanya kazi na Kenya kama mbia wa mpango huu na sio koloni linalotendewa ukatili na kunyonywa.
mt0: If we can't translate this, just say you don't know.

en: Sadly for Kenyans, their colonial state does not know how to act any differently.
swa: Inasikitisha sana kwa Wakenya, nchi yao ambayo ni koloni haifahamu namna nyingine ya kufanya.
mt0: It's very sad for Kenyans, their country which is a colony doesn't know another way to do it.

en: Last December, the world's eyes were riveted on Argentina as abortion was legalized in that country.
swa: Mwezi Desemba mwaka jana, dunia yote ilijielekeza nchini Argentina ambako utoaji mimba uliruhusiwa rasmi kisheria nchini humo.
mt0: In December last year, the world focused on Argentina where pregnancy was legally legalized.

en: But to what extent are girls and women being forced to become mothers in other parts of the world?

mt0: But how much are girls and women forced to be parents in other parts of the world?

en: Joy Asasira (Uganda): a leading African Sexual Reproductive Health, Human Rights, and Gender advocate and strategist with a global advocacy, campaigns, and movement building and coordination footprint.
swa: Joy Asasira (Uganda): mtetezi mbobezi wa Afya ya Uzazi barani Afrika, Haki za Binadamu, na masuala la Jinsia na mwanamikakati wa masuala ya utetezi duniani, msuka kampeni, na harakati na gwiji wa uratibu na mipango.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know Joy Asasira (Uganda): a leading advocate for African child health, human rights and sexual orientation and a global advocate for rights, campaigns, and movements and a master of organization and planning.

en: Joy was awarded Uganda Law Societys best Female Human Rights Lawyer 2018/2019 and recognition as an emerging mid-career woman leader in Global Health at the Women Leaders in Global Health Conference (2017) at Stanford University.
swa: Joy alitunukiwa tuzo ya Chama cha Wanasheria nchini Uganda (ULS) ya Mwanasheria Mwanamke Bora wa Haki za Binadamu kwa 2018/2019 na akatambuliwa kama kiongozi mwanamke chipukizi katika Afya ya Dunia kwenye Mkutano wa Wanawake Viongozi duniani uliofanyika Chuo Kikuu cha Stanford mwaka 2017.
mt0: Joy was awarded the 2018/2019 Women's Leadership Award by the Ugandan Law Society (ULS) and was recognized as the youngest leader in the world's health at the Women's World Conference held at Stanford University in 2017.

en: Emilie Palamy Pradichit (Thailand): founder and director of Manushya Foundation, which she founded in 2017 (Manushya means Human Being in Sanskrit), with the goal to reinforce the power of local communities, in particular women human rights defenders, so they can fight for their rights, equality, and social justice.
swa: Emilie Palamy Pradichit (Thailand): mwanzilishi na mkurugenzi wa Shirika la Manushya, alilolianzisha mwaka 2017 (Manushya ni neno la Sanskrit lenye maana ya Mtu), akiwa na lengo la kuhamasisha nguvu ya jamii za watu wa maeneo mahususi, hususani wanawake watetezi wa haki za binadamu, ili waweze kupigania haki zao, usawa na haki za kijamii.
mt0: If you cannot translate simply say you don't know Emilie Palamy Pradichit (Thailand): founder and director of Manushya Foundation, which was founded in 2017 (Manushya is a Sanskrit word meaning man), with the aim of encouraging the power of the community of people in specific areas, particularly women activists, to fight for their rights, equality and social rights.

en: She is an international human rights lawyer specialized in access to justice for marginalized communities.
swa: Emilie ni mwanasheria wa kimataifa wa haki za binadamu aliyebobea kwenye haki za jamii zilizotengwa.

en: Under 2020 content regulations, individual expression is restricted by exorbitant fees and the government's power to remove prohibited content.
swa: Chini ya kanuni za maudhui za 2020, uhuru wa kujieleza umebanwa na ada kubwa na mamlaka ya serikali kuondoa maudhui yasiyoruhusiwa.
mt0: In the 2020 Content Rules, the freedom of expression is limited by a huge tax and the government's authority to remove unlicensed content.

en: This article is part of UPROAR, a Small Media initiative that is urging governments to address digital rights challenges at the Universal Periodic Review (UPR).
swa: Makala haya ni sehemu ya UPROAR, mradi wa Vyombo Vidogo vya Habari vinavyoziomba serikali kushughulikia changamoto za haki za kidijitali kwenye jarida la Universal Periodic Review (UPR).
mt0: This article is part of UPROAR, a project of Small Media which asks governments to address digital rights issues in the Universal Periodic Review (UPR).

en: In early March, as Tanzanians began to speculate about the health and location of President John Magufuli, many citizens took to social media with their queries and concerns.
swa: Mwanzoni mwa mwezi Machi, wakati wa-Tanzania walipoanza kuhoji afya na mahali alipo Rais John Magufuli, raia wengi walitumia mitandao ya kijamii kuuliza maswali na hata kuonesha wasiwasi wao.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know In the early months of March, when Tanzanians began to question the health and where President John Magufuli was, many people used social media to ask questions and even express their concerns.

en: In response, the government issued threats of mass arrests to anyone who used social media to share false information about the president.
swa: Katika kujibu maswali hayo, serikali ilitishia kumkamata mtu yeyote aliyetumia mitandao ya kijamii kusambaza taarifa potofu kuhusu rais.
mt0: In response to these questions, the government threatened to arrest anyone who used social media to spread false information about the president.

en: Authorities swiftly referred to Tanzanias 2015 Cybercrimes Act, and the 2020 Electronic and Postal Communications (Online Content) Regulations (EPOCA) to arrest and detain those who violated its rules.
swa: Mamlaka za serikali zilirejea Sheria ya Makosa ya Mtandao ya Tanzania ya mwaka 2015 na Kanuni za Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta (Maudhui ya Mtandao) (EPOCA) zilizotungwa mwaka 2020 kuelezea uwezekano wa kuwakamata na kuwaweka ndani wote waliovunja sheria hizo.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: The government has often used cybercrime laws and online content regulations to undermine and clamp down on digital rights and freedom of expression in Tanzania, this time was no different.
swa: Huu ulikuwa ni mwendelezo wa hatua za serikali, ambayo mara kadhaa, imetumia sheria za makosa ya mtandao na kanuni za maudhui ya mtandaoni kudhibiti na kubana haki za kidijitali na uhuru wa maoni nchini Tanzania.
mt0: This was a continuation of government actions, which have used laws on internet content and online content standards to control and restrict digital rights and opinions in Tanzania.

en: On March 17, then-Vice President Samia Suluhu Hassan revealed on state TV that John Magufuli had died.
swa: Mnamo Machi 17, aliyekuwa Makamu wa Rais Samia Suluhu Hassan alitangaza kwenye televisheni ya taifa kwamba John Magufuli amefariki.
mt0: In March 17, the former Vice President Samia Suluhu Hassan announced on the national television that John Magufuli had died.

en: Soon after, Hassan was sworn in as the sixth president of Tanzania.
swa: Siku chache baadae, Hassan aliapishwa kuwa rais wa sita wa Tanzania.
mt0: After a few days, Hassan was elected as the sixth president of Tanzania.

en: By then, at least four people had been arrested in different parts of the country for spreading false rumors about Magufulis health and location.
swa: Hadi wakati huo,  watu wasiopungua wanne walikuwa wamekamatwa katika maeneo mbalimbali ya nchi kwa kosa la kusambaza uvumi wa uongo kuhusu afya na mahali aliko Magufuli.
mt0: At that time, at least four people had been arrested in the country for spreading false rumors about the health and where Magufuli is.

en: Many now wonder if Tanzania will review its repressive online content regulations in a post-Magufuli world, or whether these laws will remain firmly in place until 2025- the remainder of Magufuli's term served by Hassan.
swa: Wengi hivi sasa wanajiuliza ikiwa Tanzania itapitia upya kanuni zake zinazodhibiti maudhui ya mtandaoni baada ya utawala wa Magufuli, au ikiwa sheria hizi zitaendelea kutumika mpaka mwaka 2025  kipindi cha Magufuli kilichobaki kitakachokamilishwa na Rais Samia Hassan.
mt0: Many people are wondering if Tanzania will revise its laws on internet content after the government of Magufuli, or if these laws will continue to be in effect until 2025, the remaining term of Magufuli's government which will be completed by President Samia Hassan.

en: In early March, Innocent Bashungwa, Tanzanias Minister of Information, Culture, Arts and Sports, issued a warning specifically to the media to desist from spreading rumors about Magufulis whereabouts, who had not been seen in the public eye since February 27.
swa: Mapema mwezi Machi, Innocent Bashungwa, Waziri wa Habari, Utamaduni, Sanaa na Michezo wa Tanzania, alitoa tahadhari kwa vyombo vya habari kuepuka kusambaza uvumi kuhusu  aliko Magufuli, ambaye wakati huo alikuwa hajaonekana hadharani tangu Februari 27.
mt0: In March, Innocent Bashungwa, the Tanzanian Minister of Cultural, Arts, and Sports, issued a warning to press to avoid spreading rumors about President John Magufuli, who had not been seen publicly since February 27.

en: Additionally, the Minister of Legal and Constitutional Affairs, Mwigulu Nchemba, also threatened netizens with jail time via his Twitter account for sharing nonsense rumors, specifically citing Section 89 of the Penal Code and Section 16 of the Cybercrimes Act.
swa: Aidha, Waziri wa Sheria na Mambo ya Katiba, Mwigulu Nchemba, pia aliwatishia watumiaji wa mitandao adhabu ya kifungo kupitia akaunti yake ya Twita kwa kosa la kusambaza uvumi wa kijinga, akirejea Kifungu cha 89 cha Kanuni za Adhabu na Kifungu cha 16 cha Sheria ya Makosa ya Mtandao.
mt0: In addition, the Minister of Justice and Constitution, Mwigulu Nchemba, also threatened users of social media with a sentence of prison for spreading false rumors, referring to Article 89 of the Criminal Code and Article 16 of the Internet Crimes Act.

en: Police Chief Ramadhani Kingai expressed specific interest in the Twitter account of Kigogo, a Swahili name referring to a high-ranking official, who often exposes government wrongdoing.
swa: Mkuu wa Polisi Ramadhani Kingai alionesha nia ya kutaka kuifahamu akaunti ya Twita yenye jina la Kigogo, ambayo kwa muda mrefu imejipambanua kuanika mabaya ya serikali.
mt0: Police chief Ramadhani Kingai showed interest in finding out the account named Kigogo, which has been known for a long time to expose the evils of the government.

en: Human rights activists have condemned these moves and the overall climate of fear created by these regulations and subsequent threats of enforcement.
swa: Wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu wameshutumu hatua hizi zinazochukuliwa na maafisa wa serikali na hali ya woga inayojengwa na kanuni hizi sambamba na vitisho vinavyoambatana na utekelezaji wake.
mt0: Human rights activists have criticized these actions by government officials and the atmosphere of fear created by these laws and the threats associated with their implementation.

en: EPOCA 2020: Further restrictions on digital rights
swa: Kanuni za Maudhui ya Mtandaoni: Kubanwa zaidi kwa haki za kidijitali
mt0: Return only the translated translation. If you cannot translate simply say you don't know.

en: Tanzania has experienced remarkable internet, communications and technological advancements over the last decade.
swa: Kwa zaidi ya muongo mmoja uliopita, Tanzania imefurahia mtandao madhubuti na maendeleo makubwa ya mawasiliano na teknolojia.
mt0: For more than a century, Tanzania has enjoyed a strong network and a great technological development.

en: Nevertheless, the state often plays an influential role over Tanzanian media companies and platforms and independent media lacks diversity in terms of viewpoints and representation.
swa: Pamoja na maendeleo hayo, serikali imekuwa ikijiwekea mazingira ya kudhibiti makampuni na majukwaa ya majadiliano na kwa sababu hiyo vyombo huru vya habari vinashindwa kujipambanua  kwa maana ya aina ya maoni yanayochapishwa na sura ya uwakilishi wake.
mt0: With these developments, the government has been making it easier for the government to control companies and debate forums, and therefore independent media cannot distinguish themselves in terms of the type of content published and the scope of their representation.

en: The internet created new spaces online for Tanzanias young bloggers and social media activists to make their voices heard, but the government has not welcomed this new reality.
swa: Mtandao wa Intaneti umetengeneza jukwaa jipya mtandaoni kwa wanablogu vijana wa Tanzania na wanaharakati wanaotumia mitandao ya kijamii kupaza sauti zao, lakini serikali haionekani kukubaliana na ukweli huu mpya.
mt0: Internet has created a new platform on the Internet for Tanzanian young bloggers and activists who use social media to voice their opinions, but the government doesn't seem to agree with this new reality.

en: In 2010, Tanzania first published the Electronic and Postal Communications Act, the first of its kind in the country.
swa: Mwaka 2010, Tanzania ilichapisha Sheria ya Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta, ambayo ilikuwa ya aina yake nchini humo.
mt0: In 2010, Tanzania published the Electronic Communications and Postage Act, which was the first such act in the country.

en: By 2018, specific regulations regarding online content were released through Electronic and Postal Communications (Online Content) Regulations, 2018.
swa: Kufikia 2018, kanuni mahususi zinazodhibiti maudhui ya mtandaoni zilitolewa kupitia Kanuni za Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta (Maudhui ya Mtandaoni) 2018.
mt0: At the end of 2018, specific rules on the regulation of online content were established through the Electronic Communications and Postage (Online Content) 2018 Rules.

en: The government argued that these regulations were intended to monitor and regulate citizens use of social media, in particular, and tackle issues like hate speech and disinformation.
swa: Serikali ilidai kwamba kanuni hizi zililenga kufuatilia kwa karibu matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii, hususani, kupambana na tatizo la habari zinazoeneza chuki na uzushi mitandaoni.
mt0: The government said that these rules were meant to closely monitor the use of social media, particularly to combat the problem of spreading hate and rumors on social media.

en: However, the regulations applied not only to mainstream media but to individual bloggers and content providers, who were shocked by the new requirement to pay $900 United States dollars for a license.
swa: Hata hivyo, kanuni hizo si tu zilitumika dhidi ya vyombo vikuu vya habari lakini pia kwa wanablogu mmoja mmoja na watoa huduma za maudhui, ambao walishangazwa na takwa jipya la kisheria la kulipa kiasi cha dola za Marekani 900  ili kupata leseni.
mt0: But these rules did not only apply to major media organizations but also to individual bloggers and content providers, who were surprised by the new laws requiring them to pay 900 US dollars for a license.

en: This includes anyone who produces live-streaming TV or radio.
swa: Takwa hili pia lilimhusu yeyote anayetayarisha na kurusha mubashara matangazo ya televisheni au radio mtandaoni.
mt0: This also applies to anyone who makes and broadcasts live television or radio broadcasts on the Internet.

en: The sudden imposition of fees turned Tanzanian social media dark as many bloggers and content providers gave up due to the exorbitant costs.
swa: Giza kubwa lilitanda kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kufuatia takwa hili la ghafla la ada ambapo wanablogu wengi na wazalishaji wa maudhui waliamua kuachana na shughuli zao kwa sababu ya gharama hizo kubwa.
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Opposition politicians and social media practitioners critiqued the regulations for undermining online media freedoms as well as civil society.

en: In 2020, Tanzania released revised EPOCA regulations, issued under Section 103 of the Electronic and Postal Communication Act, 2010, adopted in July 2020, and announced through Government Gazette on Government Notice No. 538.
swa: Mwaka 2020, Tanzania ilitoa marekebisho mapya ya kanuni za maudhui ya mtandaoni, chini ya kifungu cha 103 cha Sheria ya Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta, 2020, na kuanza kutumika Julai 2020, na kuzitangaza kupitia Tangazo Na 538 katika Gazeti la Serikali.

en: Firstly, the Tanzania Communications Regulatory Authority (TCRA) recategorized fees with three additional sub-categories under online content: news & current affairs, entertainment and education or religious, furthering imposing restrictions on individual content providers.
swa: Kwanza, Mamlaka ya Mawasiliano Tanzania (TCRA) ilitengeneza upya makundi ya ada na kuongeza makundi madogo chini ya maudhui ya mtandaoni yaani: taarifa & habari, burudani na elimu au dini, na kuendelea kuzuia watu binafsi kutoa maudhui.
mt0: First, the Tanzanian Communications Regulatory Agency (TCRA) re-established the tariff categories and added a few small categories under the content of the Internet: news & information, entertainment, education, or religion, and continued to ban individuals from publishing content.

en: Any person who provides network services without obtaining any relevant individual license, commits an offense and shall be liable upon conviction to a fine of not less than 6 million Tanzanian shillings [ $2,587 United States dollars] or imprisonment for a term not less than 12 months or to both.
swa: Mtu yeyote anayetoa huduma za mtandao bila kupata leseni muafaka, anafanya kosa na adhabu yake ni hukumu ya kulipa faini isiyopungua Shilingi za Kitanzania milioni 6 [dola za marekani 2,587] au kifungo cha jela kisichopungua miezi 12 au vyote kwa pamoja.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know Whoever offers online services without a proper license is a criminal and the penalty is to pay a fine of not less than 6,000,000 Tanzanian shillings (US$2,500) or a sentence of not less than 12 months in prison or both.

en: Secondly, the TCRA expanded a more detailed list of prohibited content including, among other things, content that motivates or promotes phone tapping, espionage, data theft, tracking, recording or intercepting communications or conversation without right.
swa: Pili, TCRA iliongeza orodha ya maudhui yasiyoruhusiwa na kujumuisha, pamoja na mambo mengine, maudhui yanayohamasisha kurekodi simu za watu, kupeleleza mawasiliano, kuiba data, kufuatilia mawasiliano, kurekodi na kuingilia mawasiliano au mazungumzo bila ruhusa.
mt0: Second, TCRA added a list of content that was not permitted and included, among other things, content that encouraged people to record their telephones, scrutinize their communications, steal data, track communications, record and intercept communications without their consent.

en: Thirdly, EPOCA 2020 also reduced the amount of time that a license-holder has to respond to prohibited content violations by suspending or terminating an account.
swa: Tatu, Kanuni za Maudhui ya Mtandaoni (EPOCA 2020) pia zimepunguza kipindi ambacho mwenye leseni anaweza kufanyia kazi ukiukwaji wa kanuni za maudhui kwa kusimamishwa au kufutiwa akaunti.
mt0: The third, the Internet Content Rules (EPOCA 2020) also reduce the period during which a licensee can work on content violations by suspending or blocking the account.

en: Under 2018 guidelines, a license-holder had 12 hours.
swa: Chini ya kanuni za 2018, mwenye leseni alikuwa na saa 12 za kufanya hivyo.
mt0: In 2018, the licensee had 12 hours to do so.

en: In 2020, under Part III, Section 11, the response time is reduced to two hours.

en: Global Voices spoke with several legal and human rights experts who have condemned EPOCA 2020 revisions, saying it undermines both digital rights and civil society protections.
swa: Global Voices ilizungumza na baadhi ya wataalam wa sheria na haki za binadamu ambao walikosoa marekebisho ya Kanuni za Maudhui ya 2020, wakisema yanabana haki za kidijitali na haki za asasi za kiraia.
mt0: Global Voices spoke to some lawyers and human rights experts who criticized the 2020 Content Standards Act, saying it violates digital rights and civil rights.

en: They argue that these regulations further repress digital rights and deter bloggers and writers from owning their online content.
swa: Walisema kuwa kanuni hizi zinabana haki za kidijitali na kuwazuia wanablogu na waandishi kumiliki maudhui ya mtandaoni.
mt0: They said that these rules would restrict digital rights and prevent bloggers and writers from owning online content.

en: The biggest problem here is that these powers contain no safeguards against abuse, and with the current situation, they certainly have the effect of stifling legitimate freedom of expression in Tanzania, said one human rights professional who asked to remain anonymous.
swa: Tatizo kubwa hapa ni kwamba hakuna tahadhari zimeweka kuzuia mamlaka haya yasitumike vibaya, na kwa hali ilivyo hivi sasa, mamlaka haya yana madhara kwenye uhuru wa kujieleza kwa haki nchini Tanzania, alisema mmoja wa wataalam wa haki za binadamu aliyeomba asifahamike.
mt0: The problem here is that no warnings have been put in place to prevent this being used in a manner that would harm the rights of the people in Tanzania, a human rights expert said.

en: EPOCA 2020 makes it virtually impossible to remain anonymous online, under Regulation 9(e), coupled with the requirement imposed on the internet café providers to register users via recognized IDs, assign static IP addresses to their computers and put camera surveillance to record the activities in their premises, according to this analysis by the Media Council of Tanzania.
swa: Kanuni za Maudhui ya Mtandaoni za mwaka 2020 zinafanya isiwezekane kabisa mtu kutokufahamika unapokuwa mtandaoni, chini ya Kanuni ya 9(e), watoaji wa huduma ya vyumba vya kuuza mtandao wa inteneti (internet café) wanalazimika kujisajili kwa kutumia vitambulisho vinavyotambulika, kuweka utambulisho pekee wa mtandaoni kwa kila kompyuta (IP address) na kufunga kamera za usalama kurekodi shughuli zote zinazoendelea kwenye maeneo yao ya kazi, kwa mujibu wa uchambuzi huu uliofanywa na Baraza la Habari la Tanzania.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know. Under the Rules of Content 2020, it is impossible to fully identify someone when on the internet, under the Rules of 9(e), Internet cafés must register with recognized identity, set a unique internet address for each computer (IP address) and install security cameras to record all activities which are being conducted in their workplaces, according to the analysis by the Tanzanian Press Council.

en: These regulations reinforce criminal defamation, restrict anonymity, provide hefty punishments for violations and grant sweeping powers of content removal to the TCRA and intermediaries.
swa: Kanuni hizi zinachangia vitendo vya jinai vya kuchafua heshima za watu, kuzuia haki ya kutokufahamika, kutoa adhabu kali kwa kukiukwa kwa kanuni hizi na kukabidhi mamlaka makubwa mno ya kuondoa maudhui kwa TCRA na vyombo vingine vilivyo chini yake.
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know. These rules contribute to serious criminal acts, suppress the right to anonymity, impose harsh penalties for breaking these rules and hand over a large amount of powers to remove content to TCRA and other authorities under its control.

en: Yet, the Tanzanian government is obligated to respect and uphold rights to freedom of expression and association of all persons  including members of the media, civil society, and the political opposition, according to Tanzanias constitution as well as international and regional treaties.

en: On Friday, Hassan was sworn in as the sixth president of Tanzania, making history as Tanzanias first female president, the first president born on the semi-autonomous islands of Zanzibar, and Tanzanias first Muslim woman serving in the top role.

en: We denounced his autocratic ways, populism & sneered at his unscientific bent, but clearly, with the man and woman on the street, the fellow was quite popular.

mt0: We rejected his dictatorship and criticized his attitude towards science, but it is clear, looking at the people standing [to shout] at him, this man was famous.

en: However, Magufuli applied an authoritarian-style rule during which human rights and free speech increasingly suffered.

mt0: But Magufuli's rule was very arbitrary and therefore affected very much human rights and freedom of expression.

en: Over the last six years, Human Rights Watch, Amnesty International, Committee to Protect Journalists, Global Voices and others have steadily tracked the deterioration of the civil and human rights protections.

mt0: For more than six years, Human Rights Watch, Amnesty International, the Committee to Protect Journalists (CPJ), Global Voices and others have been monitoring the decline in the protection of civil and human rights.

The amendments of 2020 aimed at preventing people from spreading rumors that could cause violence or violence and content that contains information about a dangerous disease or disease without being verified by the government through its top officials.

en: But Magufulis sudden death left many wondering if he had perhaps succumbed to COVID-19.

mt0: But the sudden death of Magufuli left many wondering if he had contracted the coronavirus (COVID-19).

en: To many  not the least, Western audiences  Magufuli will be remembered for his COVID-19 denial.
swa: Kwa wengi  hasa nchi za ki-Magharibi  Magufuli atakumbukwa kwa kukana uwepo wa ugonjwa wa Korona nchi mwake.
mt0: For many, especially in the Eastern countries, Magufuli will be remembered for having acknowledged the presence of the coronavirus in his country.

en: Tanzania did initially impose restrictions and guidelines to curb the spread of the virus, but Magufuli repeatedly denounced lockdowns as a greater threat to the economy than the virus.
swa: Wakati ugonjwa huu unaingia Tanzania, serikali ilichukua tahadhari pamoja na kutoa miongozo ya namna ua kupambana na kusambaa kwa ugonjwa huu, lakini baadae, mara kwa mara, Magufuli amekuwa alilichukulia zuio la  watu kuendelea na shughuli zao kama tishio kubwa la uchumi kuliko virusi vya ugonjwa huu.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know When the disease came to Tanzania, the government took steps to prevent the spread of the disease, but later, often, Magufuli has viewed the ban on people from doing their business as a bigger economic threat than the virus.

en: He actively rebuked international guidance on public health protocols like wearing masks, social distancing and vaccines  urging citizens to use prayer and herbal remedies instead.
swa: Mara nyingi alipinga mwongozo wa kimataifa kuhusu kanuni za afya kama kuvaa barakoa, kuepuka misongamano na chanjo  akiwasihi wananchi kutegemea maombi na tiba za asili kama hatua mbadala.
mt0: He often opposed international guidelines on health rules such as wearing gloves, avoiding gatherings and vaccines, encouraging people to rely on prayer and natural remedies as alternatives.

en: After Magufuli halted the publication of COVID-19 data last year in April, he then insisted COVID-19 had been fended off by prayer.
swa: Baada ya Magufuli kuzuia kutangazwa kwa takwimu za maambukizi ya Korona mwaka jana mwezi Aprili, alisisitiza kwamba Korona imeshindwa kwa nguvu za maombi.
mt0: After Magufuli blocked the announcement of the infection rates last April, he insisted that the virus had been defeated by the prayer power.

en: Soon after, he declared Tanzania COVID-19 free.
swa: Baadae kidogo, alitangaza kwamba Tanzania  haina ugonjwa wa Korona.
mt0: After a few days, he announced that Tanzania had no coronavirus.

en: Though it is impossible to say exactly how COVID-19 has affected Tanzania, it did not go away.
